Godrej Properties brings you Enchanting 1, 2 & 3 BHK Resort Residences in the greenest sector of Noida, where living life to the fullest takes a whole new meaning. While you live the resort life with finest indulgences within the comfort of your home, life will seem like a never-ending vacation.

Located in Sector 150, it enjoys seamless connectivity to the major expressways of the city, the upcoming airport & the metro. It is also home to an upcoming mega-sports city with International-standard cricket academy & a 9-hole golf course and an upcoming 16-hectare park, crowning it as the greenest sector in Noida.
